# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. This unique item is not just a product but a symbol of excellence and quality. Given its exceptional nature, I believe it would greatly enhance your collection or utility, depending on your needs. I am offering it to you for $150, reflecting its true value and the craftsmanship involved. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring this opportunity further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer
